abstract: Gay rights activists in Burlington, Vt, say Sen Bernie Sanders was not always supportive of their concerns during his time as mayor there, calling into question his attempts to set himself apart from rival Hillary Clinton on issue; some observers say Sanders's strong focus on economic inequality and efforts to make politically palatable arguments clouded his support for gay rights.
lead_paragraph: Bernie Sanders expressed varying levels of support for gay rights as he rose politically, and some gay rights advocates say he was less than a leader.

headline.main: As Gay Rights Ally, Bernie Sanders Wasn’t Always in Vanguard
headline.print_headline: Sanders an Uneven Ally in Fight for Gay Rights

snippet: Bernie Sanders expressed varying levels of support for gay rights as he rose politically, and some gay rights advocates say he was less than a leader.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
